und wusste.title: und wusste
und wusste.definition:
"Und-wusste" is informal German slang, meaning "and didn't know!" or "and was unaware!". It's a shortened, colloquial way of saying "und wusste es nicht".
Essentially, it expresses surprise at a revealed fact.
